amendment.description: Amendment requires that selection panels include individuals with experience in fatherhood programs and other social programs; and adds language to encourage the payment of child support by helping fathers with visitation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 2 printed in H. Rept. 106-463. to require that selection panels include individuals with experience in fatherhood programs and adds language to encourage projects that encourage payment of child support.

vote.text: On agreeing to the English amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
